articles.title: Mysteries of Baobab trees solved! Genomic study reveals dispersion from Madagascar to Africa, Australia - WION
articles.description: Baobabs, the iconic trees native to Madagascar, are known for their distinctive swollen trunk, which can store water to help the tree survive in arid climates. They can live for thousands of years and play important ecological roles in their habitats, providi…
